name: FLUX.1 Canny Pro - Image to Image
display_name: FLUX.1 Canny Pro - Image to Image
description: FLUX.1 Canny Pro generates images using Canny edge maps for precise control over structure and style, ideal for sketch-to-image tasks.

control_image.description: Image used to control the generation. The canny edge detection will be automatically generated.

prompt_enhancer.description: Whether to perform enhancer on the prompt. If active, automatically modifies the prompt for more creative generation.

number_of_steps.description: Number of steps for the image generation process

guidance_scale.description: Guidance strength for the image generation process

preprocessed_image.description: Pre-processed image that will bypass the control preprocessing step

canny_low_threshold.description: Low threshold for Canny edge detection

canny_high_threshold.description: High threshold for Canny edge detection

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image. Can be 'jpeg' or 'png'.

safety_tolerance.description: Tolerance level for input and output moderation. Between 0 and 100, 0 being most strict, 100 being no moderation.
